dirt.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

dirt.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: information about someone’s private life or activities which could give people a bad opinion of them if it became known
dirt.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: The newspapers had been digging up dirt on the president.
dirt.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: talk, writing, a film etc that is considered bad or immoral because it is about sex
